price: (Pasi e vrau populli i vet, atij) iu tha: “Hyr në Xhenet!” Ai tha: “Ah, sikur ta dinte populli im,
arabic: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلِ ٱلۡجَنَّةَۖ قَالَ يَٰلَيۡتَ قَوۡمِي يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: qīla ud'khuli al-janata qāla yālayta qawmī yaʿlamūna
